name: N,N-bis(2-hydroxyethyl)dodecanamide
Restrictions: The residual amount of diethanolamine in plastics, as an impurity and decomposition product of the substance, shall not result in a migration of diethanolamine higher than 0,3 mg/kg food.
NotesCompliance: V18 There is a risk that the SML could be exceeded from low-density polyethylene (LDPE).
